CNBLUE

Introduction

Kang Min Hyuk is a musician and actor under FNC Entertainment. He first rose to fame as the drummer of the pop rock band CNBLUE. He also made his acting debut in 2010. Since then, Minhyuk has starred in many dramas such as "The Heirs", "Entertainer", "Hospital Ship", and "How to be Thirty".

In July 2018, Minhyuk enlisted in the military. He was discharged in March 2020.
